thread.title: Deborah Velzis Velzis
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Deborah Velzis Velzis

author: Deborah Velzis Velzis
title: Deborah Velzis Velzis
text: I would like to have the option between a medium and large depending on the cut. It seems like there is only ever one size available once I spend time picking out an item, I have no options. Very difficult to shop, would have purchased much more if any size options. .
